snippet.title: Kao the Kangaroo - Summer Drip Free DLC
snippet.description:
Summer is here! While everyone else drips with sweat, Kao is dripping with style!

The free Summer Drip DLC adds two costumes to Kao’s wardrobe! That’s four new pieces you can mix and match to create your own look.

Look like a respectable sailor ready for a new voyage, or the pool party look ready for a good time!

Kao The Kangaroo is available on PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch and PC. For more visit https://kaokangaroo.com/

Stay tuned to our social media for updates!

Twitter - https://twitter.com/Kaothekangaroo
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/KaoTheKangaroo
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kaothekangaroo
Discord - https://discord.gg/D79aQUJXdM
Kao on Steam: https://bit.ly/3JeXcJh

Kao the Kangaroo - What a Wonderful World: https://youtu.be/DEG4UGtRT0M
Kao the Kangaroo - Announcement Trailer: https://youtu.be/lwFocmxxbAY
The Evolution of Kao the Kangaroo: https://youtu.be/v3Ka1HyjDQc
Kao the Kangaroo - Friends & Family: https://youtu.be/Pg3sCKX7JuU
Kao the Kangaroo - Enemies & Combat: https://youtu.be/JVKISDRJUFE
